channel.title: CVE Feed for TPM 2.0 Tools -- all

item.title: CVE-2017-7524|2024-08-05T16:04:11.822Z -- tpm%202.0%20tools -- tpm2-tools
item.description: tpm2-tools versions before 1.1.1 are vulnerable to a password leak due to transmitting password in plaintext from client to server when generating HMAC.
